    • Method Detail

      • getConnectionTimes

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> getConnectionTimes()
                                                                      throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException,
                                                                             java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                                                             java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        Method returns a map of connection times in milliseconds (values) for each unitId (keys). The connection times are in each case subset of the time frame, which should be aggregated. Means a connection time at most limited to the size of the duration of the time frame.
        Returns:
        a map with connection times in milliseconds (values) for each unitId (keys).
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case a result parameter of the query is invalid.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - is thrown in case the application is interrupted.
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - is thrown in case the callable thread throws an unknown exception.

      • getObservations

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<OntObservation>> getObservations()
                                                                                   throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException,
                                                                                          java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                                                                          java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        Method indicates all observations of the ontology through a SPARQL query. The result is a map with the unitId as key and a list of observations as value is returned.
        Returns:
        a map with unitId as key and a list of related observations.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the dateTimes (from, until) could not be parsed.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - is thrown in case the application is interrupted.
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - is thrown in case the callable thread throws an unknown exception.

      • getAggregatedObservations
